attributes.additional_details: Bill Bratton has proven that he can run a police force and today of all days we need a strong leadership in the Metropolitan to guarantee our capital is safe. We have seen from the hacking scandal and the riots lately that no other person is better for this job then Mr Bratton himself. We don't care if he's American or not we simply need a strong leader to secure our capital from mayhem! We would like Bill Bratton to be chosen as the next leader of the Met.
